title: Add tags for solutions
description: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

comments.name: Elijah Moss
comments.message: Also, please allow styles to be applied on system preferences.

title: Q&A within the challenge hubs
description: Challange-specific Q&A would make for easy reference

title: Allow image/video upload to feedback
description: Images and screencasts can enhance comments on solutions

title: Ability to follow others
description: Stay updated on comments and solutions other people post

title: Preview images not loading
description: Challange preview images are missing when you apply a filter
